T02D1804:106b-1: tsitt'a ba ra na bi sho dha n'a ma pra k'a ra nam /
T02D1804:106b-3: sems kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa /
T02D1804:106b-4: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1804:107a-0: @107a * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1804:107a-1: thog ma mtha' ma med zhi ba //
T02D1804:107a-2: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02D1804:107a-3: rnam par rtog med dmigs dang bral //
T02D1804:107a-4: gnas pa med pa gnyis med pa //
T02D1804:107a-5: 'gro ba med pa dpe med pa //
T02D1804:107a-6: brjod du med pa bltar med pa ;
T02D1804:107a-7: / gnas pa med pa gnas med pa //
T02D1804:107a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02D1804:107a-10: sku ni snying rje'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1804:107a-11: sems can mos pa sna tshogs la //
T02D1804:107a-12: thabs rnams sna tshogs rab ston pa'o //
T02D1804:107a-15: rang gi sems ni rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02D1804:107a-16: cung zhig tsam zhig brjod par bya //
T02D1804:107a-17: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshogs kyi ni //
T02D1804:107a-18: thams cad nyid du rab nges pa //
T02D1804:107a-19: brjod par bya ba 'di dag nyid //
T02D1804:107a-20: de phyir 'di dag spyad par bya //
T02D1804:107a-21: las drag gang gis 'gro ba rnams //
T02D1804:107a-23: thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis //
T02D1804:107a-25: sems tsam rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1804:107a-27: 'di dag shin tu rgyas par ni //
T02D1804:107a-28: thog pa chen por gsal bar bstan //
T02D1804:107a-29: chos dang gang zag dbyer med pa //
T02D1804:107a-30: ye shes tsam du thub pas gsungs //
T02D1804:107a-32: rigs pa dang yang rab tu mthun //
T02D1804:107a-33: dngos 'dzin gdon gyis zin pa yi //
T02D1804:107a-34: zhen pa rab tu bsal bya'i phyir //
T02D1804:107a-35: lung las kyang ni gsal po ru //
T02D1804:107a-36: rgyas par snying rje'i bdag nyid gsungs //
T02D1804:107a-37: chos rnams sngon du 'gro ba'i yid //
T02D1804:107a-38: yid gtso yid ni mgyogs pa ste //
T02D1804:107a-39: yid gnyis kyis ni 'bad pa yang //
T02D1804:107a-41: dge slong rang gi pha rgan gyis //
T02D1804:107a-42: myur 'ded ces ni bskul gyur nas //
T02D1804:107a-43: bskul pas de nyid shi gyur kyang //
T02D1804:107a-44: mtshams med sbyor ba ma yin no //
T02D1804:107a-45: shin tu na ba'i dgra bcom pas //
T02D1804:107a-46: dge slong nad g-yog byad pa la //
T02D1804:107a-47: nga yis mgrin pa sdoms zhes bstan //
T02D1804:107a-48: de ni shi yang skyon med bstan //
T02D1804:107a-49: 'du shes gzhan gyis gzhan dag ni //
T02D1804:107a-50: shi yang nyes te mi spyod par //
T02D1804:107b-0: de phyir sems dge @107b nyes pa med //
T02D1804:107b-1: da 'dus byas pa'i blo yis ni //
T02D1804:107b-2: mchod rten bshig kyang nyes med de //
T02D1804:107b-3: nye ba'i mtshams med byas pas kyang //
T02D1804:107b-4: bsod nams phung po 'ba' zhig go //
T02D1804:107b-5: bsam pa bzang pos mchil lhvam gnyis //
T02D1804:107b-6: thub pa'i dbu la bzhag pa dang //
T02D1804:107b-7: de nyid gzhan gyis bsal byas pa //
T02D1804:107b-8: gnyis kas rgyal srid thob par 'gyur //
T02D1804:107b-9: de phyir bsam pa'i rtsa ba las //
T02D1804:107b-10: bsod rnams sdig pa rnam par gnas //
T02D1804:107b-11: lung las 'di ltar gsungs pa'i phyir //
T02D1804:107b-12: sems dge ba la nyes pa med //
T02D1804:107b-13: rang lhar sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1804:107b-14: 'gro ba'i don ni byed brtson pas //
T02D1804:107b-17: ji ltar dug gi de nyid shes //
T02D1804:107b-18: dug la spyad nas za bar byed //
T02D1804:107b-21: sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi //
T02D1804:107b-22: grong dang rmi lam ji bzhin du //
T02D1804:107b-23: 'gro ba thams cad rnam bltas la //
T02D1804:107b-24: ci zhig ji ltar su zhig spyod //
T02D1804:107b-25: byis pa rnams ni gzugs la chags //
T02D1804:107b-27: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid shes na //
T02D1804:107b-28: blo mchog rnams ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1804:107b-29: dam tshig thams cad rnam bsams la//
T02D1804:107b-30: lha la mchod pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D1804:107b-31: the tshom med par bzang por blta //
T02D1804:107b-32: sngags kyis bskul la longs spyod bya //
T02D1804:107b-33: yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1804:107b-34: sbyang dang rtogs dang de bzhin sbar //
T02D1804:107b-35: srin lag mthe bong rtse mo yis //
T02D1804:107b-36: de bzhin gshegs rnams tshim par bya //
T02D1804:107b-37: byis pa rnams la 'di bden pa //
T02D1804:107b-38: de ni rnal 'byor pa la brdzun //
T02D1804:107b-39: de tsam zhig tu longs spyad pa //
T02D1804:107b-40: bcings pa med cing grol ba med //
T02D1804:107b-42: de nyid ma mthong ba yi sems //
T02D1804:107b-44: de nyid mthong ba rnams kyi sems //
T02D1804:107b-45: rnam par rtog pa'i gdon chen po //
T02D1804:107b-46: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin //
T02D1804:107b-47: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid ches //
T02D1804:107b-49: the tshom dug gis gnod pa ni //
T02D1804:107b-50: skye bo dug gis gnod pa bzhin //
T02D1804:107b-51: de nyid rtsa ba nas bton la //
T02D1804:108a-0: snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis @108a * //
T02D1804:108a-2: dper na shel sgong dag pa ni //
T02D1804:108a-3: kha dog gzhan gyis sgyur bar byed //
T02D1804:108a-4: de bzhin rin chen sems 'di yang //
T02D1804:108a-5: rtog pa'i tshon gyis bsgyur ba nyid //
T02D1804:108a-6: tha mal rtog pa'i tshon gyis ni //
T02D1804:108a-7: rin chen sems ni dben 'gyur na //
T02D1804:108a-8: thog ma nas dag ma skyes pa //
T02D1804:108a-9: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin dri med gang //
T02D1804:108a-10: byis pas gang dang gang smad pa //
T02D1804:108a-11: de dang de la 'bad pas spyad //
T02D1804:108a-12: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1804:108a-13: sems ni dri med bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1804:108a-14: rnal 'byor dge ba'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1804:108a-15: chags med dug gis rmongs pa yis//
T02D1804:108a-18: dper na bdag nyid mkha' lding du //
T02D1804:108a-19: bsgoms nas dug kun 'thung byed pa //
T02D1804:108a-20: bsgrub bya'i dug kyang med par byed //
T02D1804:108a-21: dug gis zil gyis mi non no //
T02D1804:108a-22: 'khor lo dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1804:108a-23: lcags byas mgo la 'khor ba yang //
T02D1804:108a-24: byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag / med par gyur ces thos pa yin //
T02D1804:108a-25: byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed //
T02D1804:108a-26: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems byas pa //
T02D1804:108a-27: de yis mi bya gang yang med //
T02D1804:108a-28: 'gro ba bzung ba'i bsam pa yis //
T02D1804:108a-29: thog ma nas dag ma skyes pa ;
T02D1804:108a-30: / dngos po med pa dri med pa //
T02D1804:108a-31: 'gro ba bsam pas yang dag mthong //
T02D1804:108a-32: bcings pa med cing grol ba med //
T02D1804:108a-33: lha yi yon tan rgyas par ni //
T02D1804:108a-34: rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin bsams nas //
T02D1804:108a-35: chags pa'i sems kyis chags ba'am //
T02D1804:108a-36: chags pa spyad nas grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1804:108a-37: ci bya gang la dmigs she na //
T02D1804:108a-38: dngos po nus pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D1804:108a-39: ji ltar dug gis zin pa 'ga' //
T02D1804:108a-40: dug nyid kyis ni dug med byed //
T02D1804:108a-41: rna ba'i chu la chu nyid dang //
T02D1804:108a-42: tsher ma zugs la tsher ma ltar //
T02D1804:108a-43: de bzhin chags la chags nyid kyis //
T02D1804:108a-44: mkhas pa rnams kyis 'dzin par byed //
T02D1804:108a-45: dper na khrus mkhan dri ma yis //
T02D1804:108a-46: gos kyis dri ma med par byed //
T02D1804:108a-47: mkhas pas de bzhin bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1804:108a-48: dri las dri ma med par bya //
T02D1804:108a-49: ji ltar rdul gyis me long gi / dri ma 'dag par 'gyur ba bzhin //
T02D1804:108b-0: de bzhin mkhas pas nyes pa dag / nyes pa sbyang phyir bsten @108b par bya //
T02D1804:108b-1: lcags kyi gong bu chu nang du //
T02D1804:108b-3: de nyid snod du byas pas su //
T02D1804:108b-4: bdag dang gzhan yang sgrol bar byed //
T02D1804:108b-5: de bzhin snod du byas pa'i sems //
T02D1804:108b-6: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1804:108b-8: gzhan dag kyang ni grol bar byed //
T02D1804:108b-9: rnam shes ngan pas bsten byas na //
T02D1804:108b-11: de nyid mkhas pas bsten byas na //
T02D1804:108b-12: 'dod pas thar pa rab tu sgrub //
T02D1804:108b-14: 'jig rten kun la rab tu grags //
T02D1804:108b-15: de nyid sprul gyis 'thungs na ni //
T02D1804:108b-16: dug ni shin tu 'phel bar byed //
T02D1804:108b-17: ji ltar ngang pas 'o ma ni //
T02D1804:108b-18: chu las 'thung bar byed pa ltar //
T02D1804:108b-19: de bzhin mkhas pas dug bcas yul //
T02D1804:108b-20: sbyangs nas spyad pas grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1804:108b-21: ji ltar cho ga bzhin spyad na //
T02D1804:108b-22: dug kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1804:108b-23: byis pa rnams kyis mar kham sogs //
T02D1804:108b-24: bza' ma legs pa dug tu 'gyur //
T02D1804:108b-25: de ltar sems ni 'di nyid kyang //
T02D1804:108b-26: gtan tshigs bzang pos sbyangs byas na //
T02D1804:108b-27: rnam par mi rtog dmigs med pa //
T02D1804:108b-28: rang bzhin dri med rab tu snang //
T02D1804:108b-29: ji ltar me ni chung du yang //
T02D1804:108b-30: mar dang snying sogs 'dus byas pas //
T02D1804:108b-31: snang ba dri med mi g-yo ba //
T02D1804:108b-33: ji ltar phra ba'i sdong po las //
T02D1804:108b-34: ji ltar lo ma 'bras bu yis //
T02D1804:108b-36: yung dang rdo thal sbyar ba las //
T02D1804:108b-38: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1804:108b-39: chos dbyings mkhas pa de ltar shes //
T02D1804:108b-40: mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam ldan pas //
T02D1804:108b-41: dug nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1804:108b-42: de nyid cho ga bzhin spyad na //
T02D1804:108b-43: bcud kyis len gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D1804:108b-44: dngul chus reg pa'i zangs ma ni //
T02D1804:108b-45: ji ltar skyon med gser du 'gyur //
T02D1804:108b-46: de bzhin yang dag ye shes ni //
T02D1804:108b-47: sbyangs pas nyon mongs bzang por byed //
T02D1804:108b-48: theg pa dman la zhon pa rnams //
T02D1804:108b-49: skad cig skad cig 'ching bar byed //
T02D1804:108b-50: g-yul las rgyal bar byed pa'i sems //
T02D1804:108b-51: ring ba nyid du rnam par gnas //
T02D1804:108b-52: theg pa che la zhon nas ni//
T02D1804:109a-0: @109a * // snying rje'i go cha bgo byas nas //
T02D1804:109a-1: shes rab brgyud bcas mda' dang gzhus //
T02D1804:109a-2: 'gro ba gzung ba'i bsam pa yis //
T02D1804:109a-3: sems dpa' che dang thabs che ba //
T02D1804:109a-4: brtan pa'i blo ni gnyid sangs nas //
T02D1804:109a-5: rgal dka'i g-yul las rgyal byas nas //
T02D1804:109a-6: gzhan dag kyang ni sgrol bar byed //
T02D1804:109a-7: rang don tsam la gzhol bas ni //
T02D1804:109a-8: byol song rnams kyang nyon mongs byed //
T02D1804:109a-9: 'gro ba'i don ni byed pa po //
T02D1804:109a-11: grang dang rlung sogs sdug bsngal rnams //
T02D1804:109a-12: rang don zhugs las kyang bzod na //
T02D1804:109a-13: 'gro ba'i don la zhugs rnams lta //
T02D1804:109a-14: de mi bzod pa ji lta bu //
T02D1804:109a-15: dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal yang //
T02D1804:109a-16: snying rje can gyis bzod byas na //
T02D1804:109a-17: grang dang rlung sogs sdug bsngal dag / da ltar gyi la bsam ci dgos //
T02D1804:109a-18: dka' thub brtag pa mi bya zhing //
T02D1804:109a-19: smyung ba yang ni bya ba med //
T02D1804:109a-20: 'dir ni khrus dang gtsang sbra med //
T02D1804:109a-21: grong pa'i chos ni spang bar bya //
T02D1804:109a-22: sen mo rkang dang rus pa so //
T02D1804:109a-23: pha yi khu ba'i rgyu las skyes //
T02D1804:109a-24: sha dang khrag dang skra la sogs //
T02D1804:109a-25: ma yi khrag las yang dag byung //
T02D1804:109a-26: 'di ltar mi gtsang las byung zhing //
T02D1804:109a-27: mi gtsang bas gang ril po gang ;
T02D1804:109a-28: / de lta bu yi lus 'di nyid //
T02D1804:109a-29: gangg'ar bkrus kyang ji ltar 'dag / mi gtsang phur ma chu dag gis //
T02D1804:109a-30: yang yang bkrus kyang dag mi 'gyur //
T02D1804:109a-31: de bzhin mi gtsang bas gang ba'i //
T02D1804:109a-33: gangg'a'i klung la khyi dag gis //
T02D1804:109a-35: de phyir chos 'dod skyes bu dag /'bab stegs khrus byed 'bras bu med //
T02D1804:109a-36: khrus kyis gal te dag 'gyur na //
T02D1804:109a-37: nya pa rnams kyang don byas 'gyur //
T02D1804:109a-38: nyin dang mtshan du gnas pa yi //
T02D1804:109a-39: nya la sogs pa smos ci dgos //
T02D1804:109a-40: khrus kyis sdig pa zad pa yang //
T02D1804:109a-41: nges par yod pa ma yin te //
T02D1804:109a-42: ji ltar 'bab stegs bsten pa la //
T02D1804:109a-44: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //
T02D1804:109a-45: nga rgyal lta ba the tshom rnams //
T02D1804:109a-46: sdig pa'i rtsa bar rab tu grags //
T02D1804:109a-47: 'di dag sbyang bya khrus kyis min //
T02D1804:109b-0: bdag dang @109b bdag gir 'dzin pa las //
T02D1804:109b-1: srog chags rnams las byung ba yin //
T02D1804:109b-2: de yang ma rig rtsa ba las //
T02D1804:109b-4: de ltar nya phyis la dngul blo //
T02D1804:109b-5: nya phyis mthong bas ldog par 'gyur //
T02D1804:109b-6: bdag med mthong bas de yang ni //
T02D1804:109b-7: rtsa ba nyid nas med par 'gyur /
T02D1804:109b-8: dper na thag pa sprul gyi blo //
T02D1804:109b-9: thag par shes na ldog par 'gyur //
T02D1804:109b-10: de las sprul gyi blo yi rab //
T02D1804:109b-11: skye ba de las yang mi 'byung //
T02D1804:109b-12: de bzhin 'di la bden pa'i blo //
T02D1804:109b-13: ye shes rdo rjes ldog par 'gyur //
T02D1804:109b-15: sa bon bsregs pa'i myu gu bzhin //
T02D1804:109b-16: bdag nyid mi gtsang 'dus pa yi //
T02D1804:109b-17: gong bus yi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1804:109b-19: byis pa dga' bar rnam brtags pas //
T02D1804:109b-21: bltas nas tshes grangs brtag pa la //
T02D1804:109b-23: nyin dang mtshan mor rtag par brtag / shar la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang //
T02D1804:109b-24: rtags la ltos nas byas pa yin //
T02D1804:109b-25: gza' dang rgyu skar khyim la sogs //
T02D1804:109b-26: 'jig rten kun gyis rnam par brtag / grangs dang tsha dang char 'bab pa //
T02D1804:109b-27: ltos nas de bzhin dus rnams brtag / rang gi las kyi 'bras spyod pa //
T02D1804:109b-28: bzang dang ngan pa'i gzar bstan to //
T02D1804:109b-29: ma rig 'dam gyis gtums pa yi //
T02D1804:109b-30: sems kyi yid bzhin nor bu nyid //
T02D1804:109b-31: skyes bu mkhas pas bkrus byas nas //
T02D1804:109b-32: ma rig gang gis yang dag bskyed //
T02D1804:109b-33: gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs dang //
T02D1804:109b-34: yul dang dus la ltos med par //
T02D1804:109b-35: mtshams med the tshom med par ni //
T02D1804:109b-36: rtog pa med par spyad par bya //
T02D1804:109b-37: dbang po lam dgur gang dang gang //
T02D1804:109b-38: de ni de yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1804:109b-39: mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis //
T02D1804:109b-40: thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin bya //
T02D1804:109b-41: mig ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso //
T02D1804:109b-42: rna ba rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1804:109b-43: sna ni rta mchog nyid yin no //
T02D1804:109b-44: kha ni padma gar dbang phyug / dpal ldan he ru ka rgyal lus //
T02D1804:109b-45: yid ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02D1804:109b-46: de ltar yang dag sbyor ba yis //
T02D1804:109b-47: snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis spyad //
T02D1804:109b-48: mkhas pas sems ni brtan gyur nas //
T02D1804:110a-2: ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba yis //
T02D1804:110a-3: kun bzang kun byed de bzhin no //
T02D1804:110a-4: las dang bya ba kun byed na //
T02D1804:110a-5: ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba yis //
T02D1804:110a-6: langs dang 'dug par byed pa dang //
T02D1804:110a-7: ji ltar 'chag na'ang de bzhin no //
T02D1804:110a-8: dgod dang sma bar byed pa dang //
T02D1804:110a-9: ji ltar de ltar gang de bzhin //
T02D1804:110a-10: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa //
T02D1804:110a-11: sgrib pa kun dang ldan pas kyang //
T02D1804:110a-12: rang gi lha sbyor bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1804:110a-14: 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02D1804:110a-15: dpa' bo dag ni thams cad nyid //
T02D1804:110a-16: tshe 'di nyid la yang 'di rig / thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
T02D1804:110a-17: ji ltar 'jig rten phal pa las //
T02D1804:110a-19: gong ma gong ma'i blo khyad kyis //
T02D1804:110a-21: shes rab che dang thabs che dad //
T02D1804:110a-22: brtse ba tshe dang mos pa nyid //
T02D1804:110a-23: theg pa chen por yang dag bstan //
T02D1804:110a-24: sems can chen po'i spyod yul yin //
T02D1804:110a-25: gang zhig bskal pa grangs med ni //
T02D1804:110a-27: sangs rgyas tshe 'di nyid kyis ni //
T02D1804:110a-28: thob pa 'di la the tshom med //
T02D1804:110a-29: theg pa chen po bdag nyid che //
T02D1804:110a-30: bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyis ni //
T02D1804:110a-31: kun mkhyen go 'phang nyams dga' ba //
T02D1804:110a-33: lung las mnyam par gsungs pa gang //
T02D1804:110a-34: theg pa che la mi rigs te //
T02D1804:110a-35: bsam pa lhag bsam bye brag gis //
T02D1804:110a-36: theg pa'i khyad par rab tu bstan //
T02D1804:110a-37: gzhan nyid du ni mos pa yang //
T02D1804:110a-38: byang chub spyod pa de bzhin gzhan //
T02D1804:110a-39: sems kyi rnam dag gzhan nyid kyis//
T02D1804:110a-41: ji ltar me long dri med la //
T02D1804:110a-42: dri ma med pa'i mig gis gzugs //
T02D1804:110a-43: dang ba'i rang bzhin dri med la //
T02D1804:110a-44: shin tu gsal bar snang ba ltar //
T02D1804:110a-45: de bzhin rnal 'byor ye shes kyang //
T02D1804:110a-46: dri med ye shes me long la //
T02D1804:110a-47: rtog pa'i da ba rnam sbyangs pa'i //
T02D1804:110a-48: sems dge ba la rnam par gsal //
T02D1804:110a-49: ji ltar nor bu me shel la //
T02D1804:110a-51: de ma thag tu me 'bar bas //
T02D1804:110a-52: rang gi don ni 'grub par nus //
T02D1804:110a-53: rtog pa'i dra ba rnam spangs pa'i //
T02D1804:110a-54: nor bu me shel 'dra ba'i yid //
T02D1804:110a-55: shes rab nyi ma'i 'od phog pas //
T02D1804:110b-1: shing gnyis drag tu drud ba las //
T02D1804:110b-3: thog ma bar dang mtha' dag la //
T02D1804:110b-4: dngos po ma lus rab snang byed //
T02D1804:110b-5: shes rab thabs su sbyor ba las //
T02D1804:110b-6: rnal 'byor pa yis de bzhin shes //
T02D1804:110b-7: dper na mar me gcig nyid la //
T02D1804:110b-8: snying po gzhan dag la brten nas //
T02D1804:110b-9: ji bzhin gnas su rang don gzhan //
T02D1804:110b-10: mthon po'i gnas nas snang bar byed //
T02D1804:110b-11: shes rab thabs bdag rnam bsgoms shing //
T02D1804:110b-12: dpag tu med pa'i lus spros nas //
T02D1804:110b-13: sems can mos pa sna tshogs la //
T02D1804:110b-14: mdzad pa ji bzhin nyams su blangs //
T02D1804:110b-15: ji ltar cho ga shes pa 'gas //
T02D1804:110b-16: nyes pa med pa'i bsil nyams dga' //
T02D1804:110b-17: nad rnams thams cad zad byed pa'o //
T02D1804:110b-18: bdud rtsi 'o ma dag las blang //
T02D1804:110b-19: shes rab 'o ma thabs chen pos //
T02D1804:110b-20: cho ga bzhin du bsgrub las skyes //
T02D1804:110b-21: chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag pas //
T02D1804:110b-22: bde ba dam pas sdug bsngal 'jig / sa bon skyes bu ldan pa las //
T02D1804:110b-23: me tog 'bras bu ldan pa yi //
T02D1804:110b-25: de bzhin tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa'i //
T02D1804:110b-26: skad cig gcig gis mngon byang chub //
T02D1804:110b-27: dbang dang sdang dang 'gro ba rengs //
T02D1804:110b-28: char dbab dgug pa la sogs pa //
T02D1804:110b-29: sha chang dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1804:110b-30: byas par gyur kyang mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D1804:110b-31: lag pa'i gdu bu lta ba la //
T02D1804:110b-32: me long dag ni dgos sam ci //
T02D1804:110b-33: theg pa chen po de song yang //
T02D1804:110b-34: sngags kyi nus pa brtan pa yin //
T02D1804:110b-35: pha ma bu mo 'brel pa ni //
T02D1804:110b-36: 'dir ni de nyid med par brtags //
T02D1804:110b-37: lcags kyi ring du bshig pa ltar //
T02D1804:110b-38: 'gro ba de bzhin bde gshegs gsungs //
T02D1804:110b-39: 'byung lnga'i bdag nyid khu ba dang //
T02D1804:110b-40: khrag kyang de dang 'dra ba dang //
T02D1804:110b-41: de yi rang bzhin gong bu lnga //
T02D1804:110b-42: bram ze gang yin mthar skyes gang //
T02D1804:110b-43: dge slong dag gi lus 'di ni //
T02D1804:110b-44: thams cad bung po lnga bdag nyid //
T02D1804:110b-45: mi rtag sdug bsngal stob pa la //
T02D1804:110b-46: rigs med rigs dang ldan pa gang //
T02D1804:110b-47: nya pa'i mngal du skye ba gang //
T02D1804:110b-48: kha cig gdol ba'i skye ldan pas //
T02D1804:110b-49: dka' thub spyad pa bram zer skyes //
T02D1804:110b-50: de phyir rigs ni sgyu ma yin //
T02D1804:110b-51: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //
T02D1804:110b-52: sgyug mo dang ni tsha mo dang //
T02D1804:110b-53: bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs//
T02D1804:111a-1: / cho ga shes pa dmangs rigs mo //
T02D1804:111a-2: yan lag gcig ni nyams pa dang //
T02D1804:111a-3: dman dang smod dang mthar skyes kyi //
T02D1804:111a-4: btsun mo rtag tu mchod par bya //
T02D1804:111a-5: rdo rje ye shes rnam bsgoms pas //
T02D1804:111a-6: sngags pas spyan ni rgyas gyur na //
T02D1804:111a-7: zhal ni rab tu bzhad gyur cing //
T02D1804:111a-8: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed nas //
T02D1804:111a-9: rang gi lha yi yid kyis ni //
T02D1804:111a-10: bstan pas skad cig mthong dang lta //
T02D1804:111a-11: thos dang nyan par byed pa yang //
T02D1804:111a-12: myong zhing bde la spyod par ldan //
T02D1804:111a-13: gsal ba'i ngag kyang smra bar bya //
T02D1804:111a-14: khrus dang bsku mnye gos la sogs //
T02D1804:111a-15: bza' btung la sogs 'bad pa nyid ;
T02D1804:111a-16: / rang 'dod lha yi bdag nyid du //
T02D1804:111a-17: bsams la cho gas mchod par bya //
T02D1804:111a-18: glu dang brdung ba de bzhin gar //
T02D1804:111a-19: thams cad brtul zhugs can gyis spyad //
T02D1804:111a-20: 'dir ni dngos po thams cad la //
T02D1804:111a-21: lhag par chags par mi bya'o //
T02D1804:111a-22: rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs nas //
T02D1804:111a-23: dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya //
T02D1804:111a-24: ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung //
T02D1804:111a-26: rnal 'byor thams cad longs spyod cing //
T02D1804:111a-27: gang la'ang 'jigs med rol mo bya //
T02D1804:111a-28: sdig pa med kyis khyod ma 'jigs //
T02D1804:111a-29: dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka' //
T02D1804:111a-30: sngags kyis sbyangs na shing la sogs //
T02D1804:111a-31: bems po rmongs bcas rab dka' yang //
T02D1804:111a-32: lha nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1804:111a-33: shes dang ldan pa'i lus ci smos //
T02D1804:111a-34: tha mal pa yid rgyal nyid //
T02D1804:111a-35: mnyam par gzhag pas yongs su btang //
T02D1804:111a-36: shes rab zabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1804:111a-37: thams cad mnyam par spyad par bya //
T02D1804:111a-39: 'dam gyi skyon gyis gos pa med //
T02D1804:111a-40: de bzhin bag chags sna tshogs kyi //
T02D1804:111a-41: skyon gyis rnal 'byor pa mi gos //
T02D1804:111a-42: dper na chu yi zla ba la //
T02D1804:111a-43: chu yis mngon par gos pa med //
T02D1804:111a-44: sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'dra ba ni //
T02D1804:111a-45: mthong ba'i skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur //
T02D1804:111a-46: thog med bag chags 'dam gyis ni //
T02D1804:111a-47: rin chen sems ni rab tu gos //
T02D1804:111a-48: shes rab thabs kyi chu nyid kyis //
T02D1804:111a-49: bkrus na rab tu gsal bar 'gyur //
T02D1804:111a-50: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1804:111a-51: blo ldan sems ni brtan 'gyur na //
T02D1804:111a-52: lta ngan sprin las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1804:111b-0: sems kyi nyi @111b ma gsal bar 'gyur //
T02D1804:111b-1: don dam nges par byas nas ni //
T02D1804:111b-2: shes rab mtshon gyis kun gtubs la //
T02D1804:111b-3: ma rig sbubs kyis bkab pa yis //
T02D1804:111b-4: chos kyi dbyings ni blang bar bya //
T02D1804:111b-5: brtags pa'i bum pa skad cig gis //
T02D1804:111b-6: shes rab tho bas bcag nas ni //
T02D1804:111b-7: rang bzhin dri med gsal 'gyur ba//
T02D1804:111b-8: ye shes sgron ma rab tu gsal //
T02D1804:111b-9: rab tu gsal ba'i 'byung ba rnams //
T02D1804:111b-10: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T02D1804:111b-11: sngags kyi sbyor ba nus pa yis //
T02D1804:111b-12: gzhan nyid du ni 'byung bar byed //
T02D1804:111b-13: brjod pa thams cad yongs spangs la //
T02D1804:111b-14: sngags kyi brjod pa yang dag spyod //
T02D1804:111b-15: bde ba'i dngos grub sbyin pa yi //
T02D1804:111b-16: sngags kyi nus pa 'di la ltos //
T02D1804:111b-17: dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing //
T02D1804:111b-18: de bzhin bla ma byang chub sems //
T02D1804:111b-19: srog chags rnams kyang gsad mi bya //
T02D1804:111b-20: dam tshig dag kyang byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1804:111b-21: rin chen dang ni ga bur bcas //
T02D1804:111b-22: tsandan dmar po dang sbyar ba //
T02D1804:111b-23: thub pa rdo rje chu zhes bya //
T02D1804:111b-24: lnga po dag kyang byin gyis brlab //
T02D1804:111b-25: lha yi dam tshig gzhan dag kyang //
T02D1804:111b-26: sems ni spro bar byed pa can //
T02D1804:111b-27: rlung dang me ni zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1804:111b-28: sems kyi rdo rje tshim par bya //
T02D1804:111b-29: mtshams med the tshom med par ni //
T02D1804:111b-30: rnal 'byor rnam rtog med brtson pas //
T02D1804:111b-31: sems ni mnyam par sbyor ba yis //
T02D1804:111b-32: sngags pas thams cad mnyam par spyod //
T02D1804:111b-33: sprang ma'i rkang pa tsam gyi ni //
T02D1804:111b-34: dug gis zil gyis non par 'gyur //
T02D1804:111b-35: mtshams dang the tshom chung dus kyang //
T02D1804:111b-36: de la sdug bsngal skyed par byed //
T02D1804:111b-38: yang na legs par 'gros par bya ;
T02D1804:111b-39: / bar mdo yi dngos po ni //
T02D1804:111b-40: don med pa ru ltung bar 'gyur //
T02D1804:111b-41: bla ma'i bka' dang phyag rgya dang //
T02D1804:111b-42: grib ma yang ni 'gom mi bya //
T02D1804:111b-43: de yi yon tan gzung bar bya //
T02D1804:111b-44: skyon ni nam yang ma yin no //
T02D1804:111b-45: slob dpon lha yi mchog yin te //
T02D1804:111b-46: 'bad pas mchod par bya ba yin //
T02D1804:111b-47: de nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
T02D1804:111b-48: mngon sum gzugs kyis rnam par gnas //
T02D1804:111b-49: ji ltar nor bu chu dang gis //
T02D1804:111b-50: rnyog ma thams cad dangs byed pa //
T02D1804:111b-51: de bzhin dang ba'i nor bu yis //
T02D1804:111b-52: sems kyi rin chen rnam par spyang //
T02D1804:111b-53: shes rab mig dang bral gyur na //
T02D1804:111b-54: dad pa'i bdag nyid can rmongs 'gyur//
T02D1804:112a-0: @112a * // de phyir lung rtogs bdag nyid can //
T02D1804:112a-1: shes rab nye bar bskyed par bya //
T02D1804:112a-2: dad ldan thos mang shes rab ldan //
T02D1804:112a-3: rang bzhin snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1804:112a-4: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1804:112a-5: de yi bde ba'i thabs shes bya //
T02D1804:112a-6: sems rnam dag pa 'di byas pas //
T02D1804:112a-7: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02D1804:112a-8: rnam par dag pa'i sems thob nas //
T02D1804:112a-9: des ni 'gro ba bde thob shog / sems kyi
T02D1804:112a-10: sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rab
T02D1804:112a-11: tu byed pa slob dpon a'arya de bas mdzad pa
